comments:
Build: I20030717

If I export and re-import preferences between two workspaces, I get a
ClassCastException with the new team preference.  This is because values are
always strings in property change events during import, and the code is
attempting to cast to boolean (see bug 36216 for more discussion on this issue).

java.lang.ClassCastException: java.lang.String
	at org.eclipse.team.internal.ui.TeamUIPlugin.propertyChange(TeamUIPlugin.java:377)
	at org.eclipse.ui.plugin.AbstractUIPlugin$2.run(AbstractUIPlugin.java:249)
	at
org.eclipse.core.internal.runtime.InternalPlatform.run(InternalPlatform.java:1015)
	at org.eclipse.core.runtime.Platform.run(Platform.java:420)
	at
org.eclipse.ui.plugin.AbstractUIPlugin$CompatibilityPreferenceStore.firePropertyChangeEvent(AbstractUIPlugin.java:246)
	at
org.eclipse.ui.plugin.AbstractUIPlugin$1.propertyChange(AbstractUIPlugin.java:188)
	at
org.eclipse.core.runtime.Preferences.firePropertyChangeEvent(Preferences.java:578)
	at org.eclipse.core.runtime.Preferences.setValue(Preferences.java:1181)
	at
org.eclipse.core.internal.runtime.PreferenceExporter.setPluginPreferences(PreferenceExporter.java:145)
	at
org.eclipse.core.internal.runtime.PreferenceExporter.importPreferences(PreferenceExporter.java:70)
	at org.eclipse.core.runtime.Preferences.importPreferences(Preferences.java:478)
	at
org.eclipse.ui.internal.dialogs.WorkbenchPreferenceDialog.loadPressed(WorkbenchPreferenceDialog.java:154)
	at
org.eclipse.ui.internal.dialogs.WorkbenchPreferenceDialog.buttonPressed(WorkbenchPreferenceDialog.java:80)
Fixed an released for the next M2 candidade build.
